title: Particle Motion from velocity function part - a

content.question: Find the acceleration of the particle at time t = 2. Is the speed of the particle increasing at t = 2? Why or why not?

frqParts.text: Find the acceleration of the particle at time t = 2. Is the speed of the particle increasing at t = 2? Why or why not?

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration
